## Data Taking related News

* We have been (happily) taking data for the past weeks and we
  delivered most of the results we promised few months back to Physics
  Coordination.
* A HUGE thanks to everybody who promptly performed all the studies.

* The results are nicely summarized in a common DP note [[link]](http://cds.cern.ch/record/2037373/files/DP2015_016.pdf?version=1) and in a central TWiki page [[link]](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/PublicPlotsEPS2015)

* We, as Tracking POG, would like to have dedicated TWiki pages for each single contribution that has been approved for EPS in a TWiki page that will be linked from the main Tracking POG Results page ([[link]](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/PhysicsResultsTRK))
   * Please create the page and either link it directly from within the main page or send us the link to your TWiki.

* New samples with proper PU and beamspot has been requested by us and have been announced today ([[link]](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/relval/3909.html) and link to samples: [[link]](http://cms-project-relval.web.cern.ch/cms-project-relval/relval_stats/2015_07_24_2_0.txt))
   * Feel free to use them for both Data/Mc comparison and for assessing if the shifted BS is affecting your studies.
